name: Videosift - Declutter
description:
Gets rid of a lot of the excess crap that has started to encroach on the main content:
Facebook, Twitter, Teevirus, StumbleUpon, Google Buzz, Friends o' the Sift, etc.
additional_info: Videosift 5.0 is, thankfully, far less cluttered than 4.0 was. This style has gotten much simpler as a result.
